mutants.code:
def reverse_concatenate(arr):
    concat = 'MUTATED'.join(arr)
    reversed_string = concat[::-1]
    return reversed_string

def reverse_concatenate(arr):
    concat = ''.join(arr)
    reversed_string = concat[::+1]
    return reversed_string

def reverse_concatenate(arr):
    concat = ''.join(arr)
    reversed_string = concat[::-2]
    return reversed_string

def reverse_concatenate(arr):
    concat = ''.join(arr)
    reversed_string = concat[::-0]
    return reversed_string

def reverse_concatenate(arr):
    concat = ''.join(arr)
    reversed_string = concat[::-0]
    return reversed_string

def reverse_concatenate(arr):
    concat = ''.join(arr)
    reversed_string = concat[::--1]
    return reversed_string
